subject: [HW 05] Q8: Deep Map
content:
Q8: Deep Map

Please post all questions you have below concerning Q8: Deep Map in the follow-ups.

If you are stuck on this question, feel free to read through the follow-up responses to see if you can draw any ideas from them.

threads.question: How to copy a Link and new one does not point the old one ?

follow-ups.feedback: Since every element within the Link is theoretically going to be changed by fn, there isnâ€™t much of a need to copy the list and then mutate it. Try building a new Link from scratch.
